channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Community by PeepSo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Community by PeepSo

item.title: CVE-2023-7125|2024-02-05T21:23:11.783Z -- unknown -- community%20by%20peepso
item.description: The Community by PeepSo WordPress plugin before 6.3.1.2 does not have CSRF check when creating a user post (visible on their wall in their profile page), which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform such action via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-0187|2024-02-05T21:23:14.439Z -- unknown -- community%20by%20peepso
item.description: The Community by PeepSo WordPress plugin before 6.3.1.2 does not sanitise and escape various parameters and generated URLs before outputting them back attributes, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
